description: This is a FastAPI router module for managing 'Exam' entities within a school management system backend. It provides RESTful endpoints for listing, retrieving, creating, updating, patching, and deleting exam records, utilizing SQLAlchemy's asynchronous session for database interactions and custom CRUD operations.

methods.name: list_exams( db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db), skip: int = Query(0, ge=0), limit: int = Query(100, ge=1, le=1000), )
methods.description: Handles GET requests to list all exams with optional pagination parameters.

methods.name: get_exam(exam_id: int = Path(..., ge=1), db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Handles GET requests to retrieve details of a specific exam by ID.

methods.name: create_exam(payload: ExamCreate, db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Handles POST requests to create a new exam record based on submitted data.

methods.name: update_exam( exam_id: int = Path(..., ge=1), payload: ExamUpdate = None, db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db) )
methods.description: Handles PUT requests to fully update an existing exam identified by ID.

methods.name: patch_exam( exam_id: int = Path(..., ge=1), payload: ExamUpdate = None, db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db) )
methods.description: Handles PATCH requests to partially update an existing exam identified by ID.

methods.name: delete_exam(exam_id: int = Path(..., ge=1), db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Handles DELETE requests to remove an exam record by ID.

ctags.name: create_exam
ctags.pattern: /^async def create_exam(payload: ExamCreate, db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db)):$/

ctags.name: delete_exam
ctags.pattern: /^async def delete_exam(exam_id: int = Path(..., ge=1), db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db)):$/
ctags.signature: (exam_id: int = Path(..., ge=1), db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db))

ctags.name: get_exam
ctags.pattern: /^async def get_exam(exam_id: int = Path(..., ge=1), db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db)):$/
ctags.signature: (exam_id: int = Path(..., ge=1), db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db))

ctags.name: list_exams
ctags.signature: ( db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db), skip: int = Query(0, ge=0), limit: int = Query(100, ge=1, le=1000), )

ctags.name: patch_exam
ctags.signature: ( exam_id: int = Path(..., ge=1), payload: ExamUpdate = None, db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db) )

ctags.name: update_exam
ctags.signature: ( exam_id: int = Path(..., ge=1), payload: ExamUpdate = None, db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db) )
